title: Smart football, young QBs, Patriots, Eagles, and the Browns
itunes:title: Smart football, young QBs, Patriots, Eagles, and the Browns
description:
Colin discusses NFL teams like the Cleveland Browns caring about the wrong things, young Quaterbacks being in charge, why the New England Patriots are always ahead of the game, and why the Philadelphia Eagles are the new Seattle Seahawks. Guests include Peter Schrager, Seth Joyner, Joel Klatt, and Bucky Brooks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
